content: भ्रमः [भ्रम्-घञ्] {@--1@} Moving or roaming about, roving. {@--2@} Turning round, whirling, revolving. {@--3@} Circular motion, rotation. {@--4@} Straying, deviating. {@--5@} An error, a mistake, misapprehension, delusion; शुक्तौ रंजतमिति ज्ञानं भ्रमः. {@--6@} Confusion, perplexity, embarrassment. {@--7@} An eddy. a whirlpool. {@--8@} A potter's wheel {@--9@} A grind-stone. {@--10@} A lathe. {@--11@} Giddiness. {@--12@} A fountain, watercourse.
